sources.title: After Tonight
sources.description: Title: After Tonight Summary: While romancing a beautiful Russian countess, a captain in the Austrian intelligence service is assigned to capture "K-14", a clever spy who has so far managed to remain undetected. What ... Directed by: George Archainbaud Actors: Constance Bennett, Gilbert Roland, Edward Ellis Production Company: RKO Radio Pictures Release Date: 10 November 1933 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 While romancing a beautiful Russian countess, a captain in the Austrian intelligence service is assigned to capture "K-14", a clever spy who has so far managed to remain undetected. What the captain doesn't know is that he is actually closer to the spy than he realizes.

metadata.Plot: While romancing a beautiful Russian countess, a captain in the Austrian intelligence service is assigned to capture "K-14", a clever spy who has so far managed to remain undetected. What the captain doesn't know is that he is actually closer to the spy than he realizes.
metadata.Writer: Jane Murfin, Albert S. Le Vino, Worthington Miner
metadata.Actors: Constance Bennett, Gilbert Roland, Edward Ellis
